freesmartphone.org Framework DBus Interface Specification

org.freesmartphone.Audio.Manager

Description

Unknown

Namespace

org.freesmartphone.Audio.Manager

Methods

  • SetVolume
  • SetVolumePreference
  • Mute
  • Unmute
  • SetMode
  • GetCurrentMode
  • SetOutputDevice
  • SetInputDevice
  • GetCurrentOutputDevice
  • GetCurrentInputDevice
  • GetAvailableOutputDevices
  • GetAvailableInputDevices

Signals

None

Errors

  • NotSupported

Methods

SetVolume ( y )

Parameters

y: volume

The volume in percent (0-100).

SetVolumePreference ( ii )

Parameters

i: min

Minimum raw audio volume level for this device.

i: max

Maximum raw audio volume level for this device.

Mute ( )

Description: Mute this device.

Unmute ( )

Description: Unmute this device.

SetMode ( s )

Description: Set the current audio mode. Currently there is only a difference between normal and call. Normal means all audio use when not in a phone call and call means all audio within a phone call.

Parameters

s: mode

GetCurrentMode ( ) → s

Description: Get the current audio mode which is used.

Returns

s: mode

SetOutputDevice ( s )

Description: Set the current audio output device which is used only within the current mode. If you switch mode then the manager will switch even the output to the last used one in the other mode.

Parameters

s: name

SetInputDevice ( s )

Description: Set the current audio input device which is used only within the current mode. If you switch mode then the manager will switch even the input to the last used one in the other mode.

Parameters

s: name

GetCurrentOutputDevice ( ) → o

Description: Get the current audio output device.

Returns

o: path

GetCurrentInputDevice ( ) → o

Description: Get the current audio input device.

Returns

o: path

GetAvailableOutputDevices ( s ) → as

Description: Get all available audio outputs for the specified audio mode.

Parameters

s: mode

Returns

as: outputs

GetAvailableInputDevices ( s ) → as

Description: Get all available audio input devices for the specified audio mode.

Parameters

s: mode

Returns

as: inputs

Errors

NotSupported
